summary: Frontend-only testing for ContactSheet.jsx bug fix and TodaysFocus page. Bug fix verified in code - state reset logic correctly implemented. All frontend components pass linting. Backend endpoints return 401 for unauthenticated requests (expected). Google OAuth required for full UI testing.
critical_code_review_comments: Bug fix verified: ContactSheet.jsx lines 234-244 correctly reset caseHistory, webinarHistory, courses, and relationships when dialog closes
State reset pattern is correct - useEffect triggers on !open and clears all tab-specific data
Lazy loading pattern (lines 804-815) ensures fresh data is loaded when tabs are activated after state reset

test_credentials.note: Google OAuth required - @leaderlix.com domain users only

context_for_next_testing_agent: ContactSheet.jsx bug fix verified through code review. The fix resets caseHistory, webinarHistory, courses, and relationships states when the dialog closes (!open). This prevents stale data from showing when opening different contacts. TodaysFocus page components (AssignDMTabContent, AssignRolesTabContent, QuotesTabContent, LoadingProgress) all pass linting. Backend endpoints require authentication - all return 401 for unauthenticated requests.

bug_fix_verification.fix_description: Added useEffect that resets state when dialog closes

code_review.description: State reset logic correctly implemented in useEffect (lines 234-244)
Main page component with 6 tabs - no linting issues
Custom hook for data loading with progress tracking - no linting issues
Progress bar component - has data-testid attribute
Deal Makers tab with search and create functionality
Roles tab with filtering and pagination
Quotes tab showing cases in caso_solicitado stage
